name: Red Knight (BreixoGames)
description:
A simple 2D platformer game
  • Only playable in browser,   move using arrow keys and shoot with spacebar.
  • Destroy all  enemies and the boss too .
  • I hope you have fun trying out the 3  levels.
  • Audio on/off - a
  • Continue - c

Try not to die soon

Enjoy it!!!!
